metadata.source: M. Hahn: "The Sanskrit Text of Jñānaśrīmitra's Vṛttamālāstuti", in: Bauddhasāhityastabakāvalī : Essays and Studies on Buddhist Sanskrit Literature Dedicated to Claus Vogel by Colleagues, Students, and Friends, ed. by Dragomir Dimitrov, Michael Hahn and Roland Steiner. Marburg 2008 (Indica et Tibetica 36), pp. 93-170.

children.text: harati na kasya cittam iyam īśa
vṛṇe varam imaṃ tvad ekam atula
iha mañjughoṣa iti vaḥ prathito vyāj
prāpyeta kva nu khalu nātha mūrtir īdṛk
varada sa eka eva sumukho mukham āvahati
vrajati vilayaṃ nātha na svāsthyam āśu
yā syāt kalpadroḥ śubhaphalanibhaṃ bibhrato bhadrakumbham
daśāṃ tām ādhehi kṣaṇam api guro pāvanīṃ pāvanānāṃ
saṃsṛtau ca nirvṛtau ca śaśvadapratiṣṭhavādināṃ variṣṭha
īdṛśaṃ tu nāmato 'pi nāparasya siddhim abhyupeti
janena cātanoṣi kām api prakāmavismayāṃ śriyam
gāyati yas tavāhvayamayaṃ sadaiva bhagavan bhavādhvagajano
prīter ekaṃ līlāvāsaṃ viditabalam api munihṛdaya
yaḥ smaratīśa pratihatavimatiḥ saṃtatam antimapadam uditeṣu
tvayy ārabdho vandhyārādho vidhurayati varada sudhiyāṃ virājatayā sphuran
tanvat susphuṭam aviratam amitam amṛtarasakaṇam iva parito 'ṅgeṣu
yat kṛcchrair api na sulabham aparavividhasukṛtavidhibhir abhiyuktātmā
samadhigamavaśāj jayaty āryavaryaiḥ prabhūtapramodaiḥ pragītaḥ prabhāprakarṣas tava
iti śubharāśir mahān yas tataḥ stāj janaughe samṛddhiḥ samagre 'pi saiva
ṛjumatiṣu niyatam ṛjur amṛtakuṭa kuṭilamatiṣu niratiśaya
bhavasi na yadi niyatam abhividhivacanam anu
kiṃ bhūyo bhagavan bhavantam aśrayam āptaḥ
tat idam akhilam udañcatu bhuvanam urupadaṃ
